extension.summary: TV Guide with XMLTV and streaming support
extension.description: A comprehensive EPG that is compatible with many popular live TV addons. TV Guide Dixie gives you an overview on what is on TV right now whilst automatically triggering your favourite live TV addons.[CR]EPG data can be retrieved from XMLTV file or specialised DIXIE Url sources.[CR][CR]Navigate using the arrow keys and change page using channel + / -.[CR]
